messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Law Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a pack of squeaking things have migrated into the [REDACTED].
